meanings.definition: Aminopeptidases: enzymes that catalyze the cleavage of amino acids from the amino terminus of proteins or peptides.
meanings.sent1: The aminopeptidases in our body help break down proteins into smaller parts.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study aminopeptidases to understand how proteins are processed in cells.
meanings.sent3: The aminopeptidases at the protein party were the first to leave!
meanings.sent4: Her precision in the lab was like that of aminopeptidases carefully cutting through proteins.
meanings.sent5: The aminopeptidases acted like tiny scissors, snipping away at the protein strands.
